description: This file defines a Flutter screen widget for 'Orders Management' in an admin interface, including UI components like headers, placeholders, and layout logic.

classes.name: AdminOrdersManagementScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the admin orders management screen with a header and responsive layout.

classes.name: _NeonSectionHeader
classes.description: A private widget displaying a colorful header section with icon and texts.

classes.name: _NeonPlaceholder
classes.description: A private widget used to display placeholders for future content such as tables or filters.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the orders management screen based on screen size and theme.

methods.name: _NeonSectionHeader.build
methods.description: Constructs the header with a gradient background, icon, title, and subtitle.

methods.name: _NeonPlaceholder.build
methods.description: Creates a stylized placeholder container with an icon and text.
